  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Harmonično nihanje z in brez dušenja</string>
            <string language="en">Simple Harmonic Motion with and without Damping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache harmonische Bewegung mit und ohne der 
Dämpfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement harmonique simple avec et sans 
l'atténuation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento harmonic simples com e sem umedecer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento armonico semplice con e senza 
inumidirsi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή αρμονική κίνηση με και χωρίς απόσβεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento armónico simple con y sin humedecer</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nihanje vzmeti z ali brez dušenja.</string>
            <string language="en">The oscillation of spring in two cases: dumped and frictionless oscillation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dušeno nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">damped motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">periodično gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">periodic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pendelbewegung des Frühlinges in zwei 
Fällen: ausgegebene und frictionless Pendelbewegung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'oscillation du ressort dans deux cas : 
oscillation vidée et sans friction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A oscilação da mola em dois casos: 
oscilação despejada e frictionless.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'oscillazione della molla in due casi: 
oscillazione fatta uscire e frictionless.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ταλάντωση της άνοιξη σε δύο περιπτώσεις: 
καταγραμμένη και χωρίς τριβή ταλάντωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La oscilación del resorte en dos casos: 
oscilación vaciada y sin fricción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämpfung Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement atténué</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento umedecido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento smorzato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετριασμένη κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento humedecido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
